DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate physiological pathophysiological determinant pregnancy feed method maternal cardiovascular system . This include non-invasive measurement .
DOC.brief_title: Influence Pregnancy Post-partum Feeding Method ( Breastfeeding Versus Bottlefeeding ) Maternal Hemodynamics ( Central Peripheral ) Vascular Function
DOC.criteria: Age 20 40 year old Singleton pregnancy First pregnancy minimum age 18 year In good health , especially cardiovascular disease , diabetes BMI > 30 kg/m2 Capable understanding properly ICF investigator On chronic medication , especially antihypertensive antidiabetical drug Multiple pregnancy First pregnancy age 18 year old Smoking 10 cigarettes/day , drink 3 unit alcohol/day 56 unit caffeinecontaining drink The use extralegally drug Not able reliable blood pressure hemodynamic data screen
